column4: is the some where i can go to get some help (I am a new user)
you have to tell us what you need help with :)
how to set up a vpn
what do you need to vpn into?
voyage_ at the command line, type: groups
voyage_ it will tell you what groups your'e in.
can i tell you my problem
voyage_ from teh root folder: change the permissions and the ownership for the directory
voyage_ remove "write" access for anything except root.
alexeasta, the configuration file is a text-based file.
i need to know how to set up a remote access vpn or how to use asterisk to convert all my internet traffic
alexeasta, you will need to edit that file.
is this into a work server?
alexeasta, nothing that complicated. :) Just a second and I'll get the path of the file.
have you tried asking the system administrators? sometimes there are wonky things that make things not work as expected.
